definition: residual heat/surplus heat/fig. old people's capacity for work
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: He will return to San Paolo and perhaps continue playing there.
sentences.chinese: 而他将会返回圣保罗，继续发挥余热。

sentences.english: However he now has a chance to revive the embers of his career with Lecce.
sentences.chinese: 而现在，他有机会在莱切发挥自己职业生涯的余热。

sentences.english: The residual energy of heat will be excluded from the machine.
sentences.chinese: 直燃机排出的余热以热能的形式存在。

sentences.english: These retired men are content to devote their remaining energy here.
sentences.chinese: 能够来这里发挥余热，这些退休老人也得其所哉。

sentences.english: The steam used for production will adopt the residual heat from the thermal power plant of Tianyuan Salt Factory of Pingdingshan Haolong Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 生产用蒸汽利用平顶山皓龙公司天源制盐厂电厂余热。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a high-efficient energy-saving heat exchanger, particularly a waste heat recovery and reuse device of a boiler.
sentences.chinese: 高效节能换热装置涉及一种锅炉余热回收利用装置。

sentences.english: The power generation technology utilizing the temperature difference of engine exhaust gas is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了利用发动机排气余热的温差发电技术。

sentences.english: Excess heat in the commodity above the disired transit temperature.
sentences.chinese: 货物本身高于所需运输温度的那部分余热。

sentences.english: They tried to recuperated waste heat to produce electric current.
sentences.chinese: 他们试图回收余热发电。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the process of decay heat removal after Chinese Experimental Fast Reactor(CEFR) scram .
sentences.chinese: 分析了中国实验快堆事故停堆后余热的排放过程。

sentences.english: Waste heat accounts for about 40% of the energy produced by power stations.
sentences.chinese: 余热约占发电站产生能源的40%。

sentences.english: Tradditionally the power generation with waste gas of long dry kiln is considered as one of the energy saving measures.
sentences.chinese: 利用干法窑的窑尾余热发电是一项传统的节能措施。

sentences.english: The heat pipe air preheaters are widely used in the recovery of waste heat of gas.
sentences.chinese: 热管式空气预热器广泛应用于烟气的余热回收。

sentences.english: And it would serve as a subplot in the eventual unraveling and dissolution of the Soviet Union.
sentences.chinese: 并且在苏联最终解体中也发挥了余热。

sentences.english: You body's afterheat, rapid palpitation, not tranquil lips.
sentences.chinese: 你身体的余热，急促的心跳，不平静的吻。

sentences.english: Economizer leakage is a main problem in running of heat recovery boiler.
sentences.chinese: 省煤器泄漏是余热锅炉运行中常遇到的问题。

definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
lit. an old steed in the stable still aspires to gallop 1000 miles (idiom); fig. aged person with great aspirations
to stop burning/to go out (of fire)/to die out/extinguished
